abilities.desc: Lowers the enemy's total attack damage, cast range, and regeneration.
abilities.name: Enfeeble

abilities.desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
abilities.name: Brain Sap

abilities.desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely. Enemy Units take Pure Damage Per Second while in Nightmare.
abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.notes: On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
